languages.text: {n}Лицо проктора на мгновение меняется, словно его пнули под дых.{/n} "Если Император не отнял мой разум, то Леди Теодора мертва, и ей наследовал{mf||а}... Неважно, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кем вы были{/d} — я буду подобающе относиться к владетел{mf|ю|ьнице} священного Патента, как должно всем арбитрам, включая маршала Стракса".

{n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо проктора на мгновение меняется, словно его пнули под дых.{/n} "Если Император не отнял мой разум, то Леди Теодора мертва, и ей наследовал{mf||а}... Неважно, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кем вы были{/d} — я буду подобающе относиться к владетел{mf|ю|ьнице} священного Патента, как должно всем арбитрам, включая маршала Стракса".

It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant, as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

languages.text: {n}Für einen Augenblick verzieht sich die Miene des Proktors, als hätte er einen Tritt gegen die Brust erhalten.{/n} "Sofern der Imperator mir nicht meinen Verstand genommen hat, ist Lady Theodora tot, und ihr Erbe ist ... Es spielt keine Rolle, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}wer Ihr früher wart{/d} – ich werde mich angemessen verhalten, wenn ich mit {mf|dem Träger|der Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu tun habe, wie man es von jedem Arbitrator erwartet, einschließlich Marschall Strachs."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen Augenblick verzieht sich die Miene des Proktors, als hätte er einen Tritt gegen die Brust erhalten.{/n} "Sofern der Imperator mir nicht meinen Verstand genommen hat, ist Lady Theodora tot, und ihr Erbe ist ... Es spielt keine Rolle, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}wer Ihr früher wart{/d} – ich werde mich angemessen verhalten, wenn ich mit {mf|dem Träger|der Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu tun habe, wie man es von jedem Arbitrator erwartet, einschließlich Marschall Strachs."

languages.text: {n}L'expression du proctor change l'espace d'un court instant, comme s'il avait reçu un violent coup de pied dans la poitrine.{/n} « À moins que l'Empereur ne m'ait fait perdre la raison, dame Théodora est morte, et son {mf|héritier|héritière}... Qu'importe {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}qui vous étiez{/d}, je saurai traiter {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée de manière appropriée, comme attendu de la part d'un arbitrator, y compris du maréchal Strachs. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression du proctor change l'espace d'un court instant, comme s'il avait reçu un violent coup de pied dans la poitrine.{/n} « À moins que l'Empereur ne m'ait fait perdre la raison, dame Théodora est morte, et son {mf|héritier|héritière}... Qu'importe {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}qui vous étiez{/d}, je saurai traiter {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée de manière appropriée, comme attendu de la part d'un arbitrator, y compris du maréchal Strachs. »

languages.text: {n}眼前的监察官脸色一变，仿佛被人一脚踹在了胸口上。{/n}“帝皇在上，假如我没发疯的话，这意味着西奥多拉夫人已经离世，而她的继承人是……无论{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}你之前是什么样的人{/d}，都已经无关紧要了。我会以法务官应有的态度对待神圣授状的持有者，斯塔克斯元帅也会对你持以同样的态度。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的监察官脸色一变，仿佛被人一脚踹在了胸口上。{/n}“帝皇在上，假如我没发疯的话，这意味着西奥多拉夫人已经离世，而她的继承人是……无论{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}你之前是什么样的人{/d}，都已经无关紧要了。我会以法务官应有的态度对待神圣授状的持有者，斯塔克斯元帅也会对你持以同样的态度。”

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, la expresión del Procurador es como si hubiera encajado una patada en el pecho.{/n} «A menos que el Emperador me haya arrebatado la cordura, lady Theodora ha muerto, y su hereder{mf|o|a}... No importa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}quién fuera antes{/d}; me comportaré como es debido al tratar con {mf|el|la} portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, tal y como se espera de todo Arbitrator, incluido el Mariscal Strachs».
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, la expresión del Procurador es como si hubiera encajado una patada en el pecho.{/n} «A menos que el Emperador me haya arrebatado la cordura, lady Theodora ha muerto, y su hereder{mf|o|a}... No importa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}quién fuera antes{/d}; me comportaré como es debido al tratar con {mf|el|la} portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, tal y como se espera de todo Arbitrator, incluido el Mariscal Strachs».

languages.text: {n}一瞬、代理人の表情が、まるで胸を蹴られたかのように変わった。{/n}「もし私の正気が皇帝陛下に奪われていないのなら、レディ・シオドーラは亡くなっており、その後継者は…いえ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}かつてあなたが何者だったかは関係ありません{/d}。聖なる令状の所有者に対して、ストラッチス将帥を含むすべてのアービトレイターに期待される通りに、私は然るべき態度で接します」
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、代理人の表情が、まるで胸を蹴られたかのように変わった。{/n}「もし私の正気が皇帝陛下に奪われていないのなら、レディ・シオドーラは亡くなっており、その後継者は…いえ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}かつてあなたが何者だったかは関係ありません{/d}。聖なる令状の所有者に対して、ストラッチス将帥を含むすべてのアービトレイターに期待される通りに、私は然るべき態度で接します」

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen'in yüz ifadesi, bir anlığına sanki göğsüne kallavi bir tekme yemiş gibi değişiyor.{/n} "İmparator aklımı başımdan almadıysa şayet Leydi Theodora öldü ve vârisi ise... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Daha önce kim olduğunuzun bir önemi{/d} yok. Miralay Strachs da dâhil her Yargıcı'dan bekleneceği üzere Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili'ne karşı gereğince davranacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, the Proctor's expression changes, as if he had been kicked in the chest.{/n} "Unless the Emperor has taken my sanity, Lady Theodora is dead, and her heir is... It does not matter {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d} — I will conduct myself appropriately when dealing with the bearer of the sacred Warrant as is expected of any Arbitrator, including Marshal Strachs."
